summary: Documentary that explores mankind's desire to be famous and its effect on society.
cast: Ellis Cashmore|Max Clifford|Richard Curtis|Josef d'Bache-Kane|Nick Davies|Charlotte de Barker|Rupert Degas|Park Dietz|Emma Freud|Robert Galinsky|Bob Geldof|Jake Halpern|Elton John|Midge Ure|Harvey Weinstein
title: Starsuckers
